Class NotificationRequest

All Implemented Interfaces:
com.aloqa.trax.shared.io.Serialisable, com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps.AppIdIntegrator, com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps.MultiTarget, com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps.Request
public class NotificationRequest
extends com.aloqa.trax.shared.saps.SynchronousMultiTargetRequest

Use this synchronous request with the TraXAPI_SAP_App-interface in order to notify (in a proactive / push fashion) a set of targets about an arbitrary application message. The result received from TraXAPI_SAP_App.synchRequest(String, SynchronousRequest) will be of type NotificationResponse.

Field Summary
static byte DO_ACK
          This flag indicates that the SingleTargetNotificationRequest contained by this NotificationRequest needs to be acknowledged by the target by a respective SingleTargetNotificationResponse.

          This flag indicates that the SingleTargetNotificationRequest contained by this NotificationRequest needs not be acknowledged by the target.

Field Detail

DO_ACK

public static final byte DO_ACK
This flag indicates that the SingleTargetNotificationRequest contained by this NotificationRequest needs to be acknowledged by the target by a respective SingleTargetNotificationResponse. Note that the acknowledged request will block until all of the currently connected targets have responded or a timeout has occured.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

NO_ACK

public static final byte NO_ACK
This flag indicates that the SingleTargetNotificationRequest contained by this NotificationRequest needs not be acknowledged by the target.

See Also:
Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

NotificationRequest

public NotificationRequest(java.lang.String[] MTs,
                           SingleTargetNotificationRequest msg,
                           byte ackFlag)
Creates a new NotificationRequest for the given set of mobile terminals (MTs) all of which will be pushed the same given SingleTargetNotificationRequest.

Parameters:
MTs - An array of ids of target users to push the message to.
msg - The SingleTargetNotificationRequest to deliver to all of the targets
ackFlag - A byte value that determines whether the request is to be acknowledged or not, compare DO_ACK and NO_ACK.

getAckFlag

public byte getAckFlag()
